Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2011 10:47AM emilyj67 wrote: so glad to have found this thread (and alas, wishing this site were more easily searchable...)!  just finished 4x AC and starting 4x Taxol. I finish on May 16th and was hoping to have a supershort but sassy amount of hair by the time we go to a wedding July 3rd, but as I see the photos, it's not looking like it; o well. I think the hard thing is that I'd be more comfortable being completely bald than bird-fuzzy...hmm. patience patience patience.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
